div.p: FROM COMEDY CENTRAL'S WORLD NEWS HEADQUARTERS IN NEW YORK, THIS
IS "THE DAILY SHOW" WITH JON STEWART.
>> Jon: WELCOME TO "THE DAILY SHOW," MY NAME IS JON STEWART!
OUR GUEST TONIGHT, WE'VE GOT A FINE ONE TONIGHT.
OUR GUEST TONIGHT, ANCHOR JIM LEHRER OR, AS FANS OF THE "McNEIL/LEHRER NEWSHOUR" KNOW
(LAUGHTER) WE BEGIN TONIGHT WITH AN HISTORIC EVENT.
LAST NIGHT CNN'S TEA PARTY REPUBLICAN DEBATE.
A TRULY REMARKABLE PAIRING AS A FRINGE, OFTEN DERIDED INCOMPETENT BUNCH OF YAHOOS WAS
GRANTED LEGITIMACY BY PAIRING WITH THE TEA PARTY.
(LAUGHTER) I THOUGHT YOU GUYS WERE WATCHING THAT ONE COME FROM AROUND THE CORNER.
I'M SURPRISED THAT ONE TOOK YOU BY SURPRISE.
THE DEBATE, IN FRONT OF THE FOUNDING FATHER LOVING TEA PARTY LOYALISTS IS THE SUBJECT OF
